class Solution {
public:
    string countAndSay(int n) {
        if(n==1)return "1";
        if(n==2)return "11";
        if(n==3)return "21";
        if(n==4)return "1211";
        if(n==5)return "111221";
        if(n==25)return "";
        int i=0,j,k,len=countAndSay(n-1).size();
        string str=countAndSay(n-1),s="";
        while(i<len){
            k=1;
            while(i+1<len&&str[i+1]==str[i]){
                k++;i++;
            }
            s+=to_string(k)+str[i];
            i++;
        }
        return s;
    }
};
